languages.text: "Не сочтите за трусость, Лорд-капитан, но я бы предпочел убраться отсюда как можно скорее. Кто знает, сколько подобных тварей может скрываться в глубинах дворца".

traits.locale_text: "Не сочтите за трусость, Лорд-капитан, но я бы предпочел убраться отсюда как можно скорее. Кто знает, сколько подобных тварей может скрываться в глубинах дворца".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."
languages.original_text: "Не сочтите за трусость, Лорд-капитан, но я бы предпочел убраться отсюда как можно скорее. Кто знает, сколько подобных тварей может скрываться в глубинах дворца".

traits.locale_text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not think of me as a coward, Lord Captain, but I would rather leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures may lurk in the depths of the palace."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「臆病者だと思われたくはありませんが、ロード・キャプテン、すぐにでもこの場所から離れたく思います。この宮殿の奥に、このような生き物があと何体潜んでいるかわかりません」
languages.original_text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."

traits.locale_text: 「臆病者だと思われたくはありませんが、ロード・キャプテン、すぐにでもこの場所から離れたく思います。この宮殿の奥に、このような生き物があと何体潜んでいるかわかりません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, espero que no me considere un cobarde, pero preferiría que nos marcháramos de aquí cuanto antes. No sabemos cuántas de estas abominaciones acechan en las profundidades del palacio».
languages.original_text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, espero que no me considere un cobarde, pero preferiría que nos marcháramos de aquí cuanto antes. No sabemos cuántas de estas abominaciones acechan en las profundidades del palacio».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，不是我贪生怕死，但我建议还是立刻离开此处为好。谁知道这宫殿深处还有多少这样的怪物。”
languages.original_text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，不是我贪生怕死，但我建议还是立刻离开此处为好。谁知道这宫殿深处还有多少这样的怪物。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'espère que vous ne me prendrez pas pour un couard, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je préférerais quitter cet endroit dès que possible. Qui sait combien de créatures de ce genre rôdent dans les profondeurs du palais. »
languages.original_text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vous ne me prendrez pas pour un couard, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais je préférerais quitter cet endroit dès que possible. Qui sait combien de créatures de ce genre rôdent dans les profondeurs du palais. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Haltet mich nicht für einen Feigling, Lord Captain, doch ich würde lieber so schnell wie nur möglich von hier verschwinden. Wer weiß, wie viele solcher Kreaturen in den Tiefen des Palasts lauern."
languages.original_text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."

traits.locale_text: "Haltet mich nicht für einen Feigling, Lord Captain, doch ich würde lieber so schnell wie nur möglich von hier verschwinden. Wer weiß, wie viele solcher Kreaturen in den Tiefen des Palasts lauern."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Beni korkak sanmayın Lord Kaptan ancak tez vakitte buradan çıkıp gitmemizi yeğlerim. Kim bilir bu sarayın derinliklerinde daha nicesi saklanıyordur..."
languages.original_text: "Do not think me a coward, Lord Captain, but I would prefer to leave this place as soon as we can. Who knows how many such creatures lurk in the palace depths."
